Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.Visualisation.Java2D

Class J2DFactory

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.GameLogic.AbsFactory
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.Visualisation.Java2D.J2DFactory
public class J2DFactory extends AbsFactory
The J2DFactory class represents a factory for creating Java 2D visual elements in the Space Invaders game. It extends the AbsFactory class and provides concrete implementations for creating specific visual elements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    J2DFactory(int fieldWidth, int fieldHeight, Game game)
    Constructs a J2DFactory object with the specified field dimensions and Game instance.
